intro: Psychotria butayei, commonly known as the Butayi Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, particularly found in humid lowland forests. The plant is characterized by its dark green, elliptical leaves and produces small, fragrant white or pale yellow flowers. It is often found growing in the understory of dense vegetation, where it thrives in shaded, moist conditions. The plant's botanical features make it an important component of its native ecosystems.
